songs.title: Charlie Brown (Live in Buenos Aires)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Let's go
[?]
Yeah
Okay, alright
Muchisimas gracias amigos
Tenemos mucha suerte de estar aquí
Uno, dos, ¡saltando!

[Verse 1]
I stole a key
Took a car downtown where the lost boys meet
Took a car downtown, took what they offered me
To set me free
I saw the lights go down at the end of the scene
Saw the lights go down, and standing in front of me

[Chorus 1]
Is you

[Verse 2]
In my scarecrow dreams
When they smash my heart into smithereens
Be a bright red rose come bursting through concrete
Be a cartoon heart
Oh, and light a fire, a fire, a spark
Light a fire, a flame in my heart
We’ll run wild
We’ll be glowing in the dark

[Chorus 2]
Whoo-ooh
Glowing in the dark
Whoo, whoo

[Bridge]
All the boys, all the girls
All that matters in the world
All the boys, all the girls
All the madness that occurs
All the highs, all the lows
As the room a-spinning goes
We’ll run riot
We’ll be glowing in the dark

[Interlude]
Manos, por favor, arriba
Sing, ruido
Vamos a saltar, a saltar
¡Uno, dos, tres, go!

[Outro]
So we’ll soar
Luminous and wired
We’ll be glowing in the dark
Estáis tan generoso
Muchisimas gracias con todo mi corazón
